voicePreviewNotAvailable: Preview voice is not ready, but you can still create the storybook.
noVoiceWarning: No voice is ready. Please register a voice first.

pageLimit.title: Page Limit
pageLimit.maxPages: You can create up to 5 pages.
pageLimit.minPages: There must be at least one page.

bookLimit.title: Book Limit
bookLimit.message: You can create up to 5 storybooks. Please delete an existing book and try again.

validation.title: Check Input
validation.message: Please fill in images and stories for all pages.

success.title: Book Creation
success.message: It may take 3 to 5 minutes to complete.

error.title: Error
error.message: An error occurred. Please try again.
